attributes.action: Rapidly withdraw from the European Union and create the consensus for this to occur
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Complete and utter withdrawl from the European Union, and re-entry into the European Free Trade Association, as a independant, capitilist, sovereign nation.
closure of UK borders to EU nationals, unless specified "key workers" to benefit United Kingdom as a whole.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
